mapper.update: UPDATE om_scene_rel_grade SET remaining_sum = remaining_sum + #{orderNum} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE om_scene_rel_grade SET remaining_sum = start_sum WHERE scene_id = #{sceneId}
mapper.select: SELECT osrg.id, osrg.grade_id, osrg.scene_id, osrg.remaining_sum FROM om_scene_rel_grade osrg WHERE osrg.id = #{relId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ot.id AS ticketId, ots.id AS sceneId, otg.id AS gradeId, SUM(seat.seat_sum) AS remainingSum, SUM(seat.seat_sum) AS startSum FROM om_ticket ot INNER JOIN om_ticket_scene ots ON ots.ticket_id = ot.id AND ot.id= #{ticketId} INNER JOIN om_ticket_grade otg ON otg.ticket_id = ot.id INNER JOIN om_ticket_seat seat ON seat.grade_id = otg.id GROUP BY ot.id, ots.id, otg.id

SELECT osrg.id AS priceId, otg.`sell_price` AS price, osrg.remaining_sum AS stock, ots.id AS sceneId, ots.`name` AS sceneName, otg.id AS gradeId, otg.`name` AS gradeName FROM om_ticket ot INNER JOIN om_scene_rel_grade osrg ON ot.id = osrg.ticket_id AND ot.id = #{ticketId} INNER JOIN om_ticket_scene ots ON osrg.scene_id = ots.`id` INNER JOIN om_ticket_grade otg ON otg.id = osrg.`grade_id` WHERE ots.`start_time` > NOW() ORDER BY ots.`start_time` ASC
